starters.name: Salt and pepper squid
starters.description: Kick-start your dinner party with a crowd-pleasing plate of salt and pepper squid – the mix of sichuan and black peppercorns gives a tingly spiciness and kick of heat. This recipe is from the co-owners of seafood restaurant Prawn on the Lawn.

starters.name: Namas
starters.description: Red snapper fillet is flavoured with citrus and coconut cream to create a smooth, fragrant and refreshing starter that’s similar to ceviche.

starters.name: Prawns pil pil
starters.description: This prawn starter for two sees plump prawns in a deliciously garlicky, spicy oil. Don’t forget the crusty bread for mopping up all of those wonderful juices.

starters.name: Giant champagne and lemon prawn vol-au-vents
starters.description: Take your Christmas dinner starter to the next level by adding champagne to your king prawn vol-au-vents.

starters.name: Grilled scallops with ’nduja butter
starters.description: Start Christmas dinner with a bang and serve these flavour-packed, spicy scallops in their shells.
